:mod:`pygeoutils.print_versions`
================================

.. py:module:: pygeoutils.print_versions

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Utility functions for printing version information.

   The original script is from
   `xarray <https://github.com/pydata/xarray/blob/master/xarray/util/print_versions.py>`__



Module Contents
---------------

.. function:: get_sys_info() -> List[Tuple[str, Optional[str]]]

   Return system information as a dict.

   From https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/setup.py#L64-L89


.. function:: netcdf_and_hdf5_versions() -> List[Tuple[str, Optional[str]]]

   Get netcdf and hdf5 versions.


.. function:: show_versions(file: IO = sys.stdout) -> None

   Print the versions of pygeohydro stack and its dependencies.

   :param file: print to the given file-like object. Defaults to sys.stdout.
   :type file: file-like, optional
